scene_description_enriched: Two winged figures, identified as angels by their halos, stand on a grassy ground scattered with small plants. The angel on the left wears a golden robe and has blue wings, while the angel on the right wears a white and blue patterned robe and has green wings. Both angels hold a blue shield adorned with a chevron and two trefoils, and a central orange oval shape. The background is a patterned purple fabric with scattered gold leaf motifs. The scene is framed by a decorative gold border.
